dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S1157 IS: To reauthorize the Rivers of Steel National Heritage Area, the Lackawanna Valley National Heritage Area, the Delaware and Lehigh National Heritage Corridor, and the Schuylkill River Valley National Heritage Area.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Casey introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Rivers of Steel National Heritage Area, the Lackawanna Valley National Heritage Area, the Delaware and Lehigh National Heritage Corridor, and the Schuylkill River Valley National Heritage Area.

section.header: Reauthorization of National Heritage Areas and Corridor

subsection.header: Rivers of Steel National Heritage Area
subsection.text: Section 408 of the Steel Industry American Heritage Area Act of 1996 (Public Law 104–333; 110 Stat. 4256; 127 Stat. 420) is amended by striking 2013 and inserting 2023.
Section 108 of the Lackawanna Valley National Heritage Area Act of 2000 (Public Law 106–278; 114 Stat. 818; 127 Stat. 420) is amended by striking 2013 and inserting 2023.

subsection.header: Delaware and Lehigh National Heritage Corridor
subsection.text: Section 12 of the Delaware and Lehigh Navigation Canal National Heritage Corridor Act of 1988 (Public Law 100–692; 102 Stat. 4558; 112 Stat. 3260; 123 Stat. 1293; 127 Stat. 420) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (d), by striking 2013 and inserting 2023.

subsection.header: Schuylkill River Valley National Heritage Area
subsection.text: Section 209 of the Schuylkill River Valley National Heritage Area Act (Public Law 106–278; 114 Stat. 824) is amended by striking the date that is 15 years after the date of enactment of this title and inserting September 30, 2023.
